infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app needs your location to alert you when you enter or exit emergency disaster zones, even when the app is closed or in the background.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs your location to show nearby disaster zones and alert you about emergencies.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app needs background location access to alert you about emergency zones even when the app is closed.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow PrepareNow to use your location to alert you about emergency disaster zones, even when the app is closed.
plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: Allow PrepareNow to use your location in the background to alert you about emergency zones.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow PrepareNow to use your location to show nearby disaster zones.
